text: The women's lightweight quadruple sculls competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Tuesday 27 August 2019 || 11:48 || Test race |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| Friday 30 August 2019 || style=background:lemonchiffon| 15:52 || style=background:lemonchiffon| Final |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Test race=== With fewer than seven entries in this event, boats contested a race for lanes before the final. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | 1 | align="left"|Cheng Mengyin Wu Qiang Chen Fang Yuan Xiaoyu | align="left"| | 6:31.76 |- | 2 | align="left"|Giulia Mignemi Greta Martinelli Silvia Crosio Arianna Noseda | align="left"| | 6:33.00 |- | 3 | align="left"|Jessica Hyne- Dolan Michaela Copenhaver Rosa Kemp Mary Reckford | align="left"| | 6:35.29 |- | 4 | align="left"|Fini Sturm Vera Spanke Leonie Pieper Leonie Pless | align="left"| | 6:37.69 |- | 5 | align="left"|Lương Thị Thảo Tạ Thanh Huyền Đinh Thị Hảo Hồ Thị Lý | align="left"| | 6:49.40 |} ===Final=== The final determined the rankings. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | | align="left"|Giulia Mignemi Greta Martinelli Silvia Crosio Arianna Noseda | align="left"| | 6:34.00 |- | | align="left"|Cheng Mengyin Wu Qiang Chen Fang Yuan Xiaoyu | align="left"| | 6:36.31 |- | | align="left"|Fini Sturm Vera Spanke Leonie Pieper Leonie Pless | align="left"| | 6:37.72 |- | 4 | align="left"|Jessica Hyne- Dolan Michaela Copenhaver Rosa Kemp Mary Reckford | align="left"| | 6:38.36 |- | 5 | align="left"|Lương Thị Thảo Tạ Thanh Huyền Đinh Thị Hảo Hồ Thị Lý | align="left"| | 6:55.71 |} ==References== Category:2019 World Rowing Championships World
title: 2019 World Rowing Championships – Women's lightweight quadruple sculls
